output.sentences: This colorful bus was going on a sight seeing tour
The first stop was the Maid's Causeway
Then the bus goes along through downtown Cambridge
We go and stop to take pictures at this gated building which I have seen many times
The last stop on the tour was seeing Cambridge University where people were excited they were letting us take beautiful pictures
